bookSourceComment:
┍　　　说明　　　作者：洛娅橙　　┒
├────────────────┤
│①书源默认优化正文加载，可能会导│
│致下载书籍异常，在该登录界面点击│
│启用下载即可。　　　　　　　　　│
│②登录界面开启同步书架功能，在详│
│情页下拉刷新两次或书架刷新，会自│
│动同步至网站书架。　　　　　　　│
│③支持屏蔽书籍为黑名单，之后在搜│
│索和发现不再显示屏蔽后的书籍。误│
│点时，可再次点击进行恢复。　　　│
│④输出名单到日志需要在软件其它设│
│置里开启记录日志功能。　　　　　│
├────────────────┤
│　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　│
│请使用阅读最新测试版导入该书源　│
└────────────────┘
┍　　　　书源作者：洛娅橙　　　　┒
├───┬────────────┤
│！免责│本书源只提供代码进行技术│
│！声明│交流，请于２４小时后删除│
├───┴────────────┤
│可在书源登录界面进行登录　　　　│
│书籍变量可用来进行交互，详情查看│
│相应界面的变量说明　　　　　　　│
└────────────────┘
___________________________________________
八叉发布页：https://8xsk.org
ip地址查看：https://iplark.com

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
//重定向和导入书架处理
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) {
	book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(baseUrl.replace(/,{o.+/,''))},{'type':''}`;
	}

//告诉目录是由详情来的
java.put('sx1',1);

nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}

//发书评功能
let bkbl = book.getVariable("custom");
//解书籍地址
let ml = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
let bkid = (mlj.match(/book\/(\d+)/)||['',''])[1];
//↑获取书id
java.put('bkid',bkid);

if (bkbl=='🔒'||bkbl=='') {
//带🔒或书籍变量为空会经过这里
//处理加书架功能
let sj=java.get('sj');
let sj2=source.get('8xsj'); //启用同步的标识
if (sj=='2'&&sj2=='1') {java.put('sj',3);tbshujia(nn,bkid);}
else if (sj=='1') {java.put('sj',2);}

	}
else if (bkbl=='目录') {
	//清空最新章储存强制刷新目录
	java.put('8xzx','');
	//清空输入的书籍变量
	book.putCustomVariable('');}
else {
let pfurl = nn+'/modules/article/rating.php';
let plurl = nn+'/modules/article/reviews.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader()||'';
let cki = ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||['',''];
tk = cki[1];
//ck = cookie.getCookie(nn);
//↑获取链接和tk

if (bkid != '' && tk != '') {
let tm = new Date().getTime();
let bkfs = (bkbl.match(/^(\d|10)分$/) || ['','0'])[1];
let pfbody = `score=${bkfs}&id=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;
let plbody = `ptitle=&act=newpost&jieqi_token=${tk}&Submit=&pcontent=${bkbl}&aid=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;

let headers = {
        'User-Agent': ua,
        'x-requested-with': x_r_w,
        'sec-ch-ua-platform': s_c_u,
        'referer': mlj,
        'cookie': ck
    };
if (bkfs != 0) {url=pfurl;body=pfbody;}
else {url=plurl;body=plbody;}
//清空输入的书籍变量
book.putCustomVariable('');
let by = java.post(url,body,headers).body();
java.longToast("\n"+java.htmlFormat(by));
	} else if (tk == '') {java.toast('未登录');}
}

//随机延时0-1秒
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*1001);
//java.log('延时'+tim);
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim);

//先发评论再访问刷新
if (!i) {
	let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
	//不能直接访问tt，result无法改动
	tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
	const startTime=new Date().getTime();
	result = java.ajax(nn+tt); //+",{'webView': true}"
	const endTime=new Date().getTime();
	let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
	if (speed>39) {java.toast('\n详情页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');}
	java.setContent(result);
	}

//内容判断
let r = java.getString('@@meta[name="keywords"]@content');
let name=String(r).replace(/\, .+/,'');
let author=String(r).replace(/.+\, /,'');

if (name) {
	book.name=String(book.name)||name;
	book.author=String(book.author)||author;
//放入书名
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
//放入ID和书名。正式版js语法报错点
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});
	if (book.name!=name) {
			let sm=source.get('8xsm'),sm1=java.get('sm1');
			//sm功能标记，sm1判断标记
			if (sm1=='') {
			//可能源地址换新了，进行更新
			cache.put('8xbl1', source.getVariable() );
			source.setVariable('');
			java.put('sm1',1);
			} else if (sm=='1') {
				book.name=name;
				java.toast("已自动更新书名");
			} else if (sm1=='1') {
				java.longToast("详情页获取的书名：\n《"+name+"》");
				java.log("书名："+name);
				java.put('sm1',2);
			}
			
}	else if (book.author!=author) {java.log("获取的作者不同，作者："+author);} //仅输出日志
	
	//书名和作者正常由此过
	}
else {
	//书名加载失败
	cache.put('8xbl1', source.getVariable() );
	source.setVariable('');
	java.toast("详情页加载失败，请刷新重试");
}
	result
</js>
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
//清除用户自定义简介
//book.delete(); //如果更新发生异常会掉书籍信息，目录页取消书架
//book.upCustomIntro(); //目录页生效

//解书籍url为http
let ml = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
if (mlj.includes('search.php') ) {java.toast('书籍地址异常');}
//转化目录url
let mll = mlj.replace('/book/', '/read/');
`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(mll)},{'type':''}`;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let bin = book.durChapterIndex;
let cin = chapter.index;
let inn = cin - bin;
let dn = source.get('8xdn');
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn);
if ((inn==-4||inn==4)&&dn!=1) {java.longToast('\n使用下载需要在书源登录界面开启功能\n建议预下载设定不要大于3');}

nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}

let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
let ii = 1;
//手动限制并发,下载时(0-40秒随机)

switch(inn) {
	case 0: break;
	case 1: sleep(1500+tim); break;
	case 2: sleep(4500+tim); break;
	case 3: sleep(7500+tim); break;
	case -1: sleep(3000+tim); break;
	case -2: dn==1 ? sleep(6000+tim) : ii=0;break;
	case -3: dn==1 ? sleep(9000+tim) : ii=0;break;
	default: dn==1 ? sleep(tim*100) : ii=0;break;
}

//延时结束
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn+'延时结束');
let bkid = java.get('bkid'); //两个putm用

if (inn==0||inn==1) {
//放入书名和id
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
}

let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,nn);
//java.log('正文地址：'+tt);
let ml = String(book.tocUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
let ck0 = source.getLoginHeader();
let headers0 = {
        'user-agent': ua,
        'x-requested-with': x_r_w,
        'sec-ch-ua': s_c_u,
        'sec-ch-ua-platform': s_c_u_p,
        'referer': mlj,
        'cookie': ck0
    };

let getr;
if (ii) {
//↓第一次访问正文
try {
const startTime=new Date().getTime();
getr = java.get(tt,headers0);
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn+'访问结束');
const endTime=new Date().getTime();
//判断访问情况，错误时把响应内容清除
if (getr.statusCode() == 200) {
	result = getr.body();
	let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
	if (speed>39) java.toast('\n正文页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');
	} else {java.toast('\n正文链接响应码错误，inn='+inn);result='';}
//复原手机版链接，干掉字数统计
chapter.url = tt.replace('www.','');

//拦截超时报错
} catch (e) {if (/timeout/.test(e)) java.toast('正文超时');
java.log('🍊正文出错：'+e);}
// if ii 结束
	} else {result='';}
//inn>1时为空，软件会自动重新获取

let rr = java.getString('class.mt mb@a@text||class.tc mb@a@text',result);

//内容识别
if (rr.includes("登录") ) {
	java.toast("💎请重新登录书源账号");
	result='';}
else if (rr.includes("充值") ) {
let url = nn+'/modules/obook/buychapter.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader();
let tk = (ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||['',''])[1];
let cid = tt.match(/cid\=(\d+)/)[1];
let body = `buytype=1&act=buy&jieqi_token=${tk}&cid=${cid}&submit=`;
let headers = {
        'user-agent': ua,
        'x-requested-with': x_r_w,
        'sec-ch-ua': s_c_u,
        'sec-ch-ua-platform': s_c_u_p,
        'referer': tt,
        'cookie': ck
    };

// let vip = cache.getFromMemory('8xvip'+bkid);
// &&vip!=1
if (tk && nn) {
	//标识本书准备请求VIP，防其它章节请求
	// cache.putMemory('8xvip'+bkid,1);
	sleep(600-tim);
	let pt = java.post(url,body,headers);
	let lc = pt.header("location");
//	java.toast("🔓已购买");
	//重新解析正文
	result = java.ajax(lc);
	result = java.getString('#content,#acontent,#contenty@html',result);
	} else {java.longToast("💔VIP内容获取失败");
	result='';}

}
else {
//无VIP登录，正常直接加载
result = java.getString('#content,#acontent,#contenty@html',result);
}
//检查
if ([39,339].includes(cin)&&Math.abs(inn)<4) gengxin();
result
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('http://127.0') ) {
		result = [];
}
else if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {
let r1 = java.getString('#content .blockcontent@text');
if (r1.includes("错误原因")) {java.longToast(r1);result = [];}
else {result = java.getElement('#jieqi_page_contents>div');}
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/book/') ){
java.toast('暂不支持重定向结果');
result=[];
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
	//我的书架
	let ts= java.getString('table@caption@ownText');
	ts=String(ts).replace(/，(.+)\s*选择分组.*$/,'，\n$1');
	java.toast('\n'+ts);
	result = java.getElement('table tr:has(a)');
	}
else {
result = java.getElements('@@#jieqi_page_contents>tr||#content div[class="c_row cf"]');
}
result
</js>

ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
let jhf=source.get('8xjhf');
if (jhf=='1') img=jinghuafm();
else {

if (/articlelist|sort/.test(baseUrl)) {
	img = java.getString('img@src');
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {
	img = java.getString(String(source.ruleSearch.coverUrl));
	}
else{
	id = java.getString('td.0@a.-1@href').match(/\d+(?=\.html)/);

if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {id = java.getString('td.1@a.-1@href').match(/aid=(\d+)/)[1];}

  if (id < 1000) n = 0;
  else n = String(id).slice(0,-3);
img = `https://www.8xbook.com/files/article/image/${n}/${id}/${id}s.jpg`;
}

}
img
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}
let sj=java.get('sj');
if (sj=='') java.put('sj',1); //书架标识
let ww = java.get('ww'),
lyc = java.get('lyc'),
sx1 = java.get('sx1'); //ww是否有新章，sx刷新标识从目录来(已在书架才会触发)
java.put('sx1',0); //还原详情到目录标识
let sj2=source.get('8xsj'); //启用同步的标识
let bkid=java.get('bkid');

if (sx1!='1') {
	 let baxtime = cache.getFromMemory('baxtime');
	 if (baxtime<Date.now()) baxtime=Date.now();
	 baxtime+=4000;
	cache.putMemory('baxtime',baxtime);
	while(Date.now()<baxtime) {
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(4100);}
	}
if (sj!='3'&&sx1!='1'&&sj2=='1'&&bkid!='') {java.put('sj',3);tbshujia(nn,bkid);}
//不为3未加书架，不为1不过详情，为1开启功能，且参数不为空
if (ww!='1' || lyc=='' || sx1!='1') {
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*1501);
let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim);
const startTime=new Date().getTime();
result = java.ajax(nn+tt);
const endTime=new Date().getTime();
let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
if (speed>39) {java.toast('\n目录页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');}
//缩减储存
result=java.getString('.index@all',result);
java.put('lyc',result);
} else {result=lyc;}
java.setContent(result);
result=java.getElement('.index dd, .index dt');
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName: dd a,dt@text##八叉书库|833330\.xyz|八叉书[。·]库|8xsk?[。·]org|八叉~书库|八~叉书~库

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
//let cok=cookie.getCookie(nn);
//cookie.removeCookie(nn);
let url = `${nn}/modules/article/search.php`;
try {
	if (key.startsWith('书名：') ) {
		url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=articlename&page=${page}`
			ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
		}
		
		else if (key.startsWith('作者：') ) {
		url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=author&page=${page}`
			ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
		}
		
		else if (key.startsWith('标签：') ) {
		url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=keywords&page=${page}`
			ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
		}
		
		else if (page == 1) {
		ftsm();
		let body = `searchtype=all&searchkey=${key}&act=search&submit=`;
	ss = java.post(url,body,{	'User-Agent': ua});
	key='';
	}
	
	else {
		url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	}

code = ss.statusCode();
if (code == 302) {
	//重定向
	ss.header("location");
	}
else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('8xss1', ss.body());
	url=`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(nn)},{'type':''}`;
	}
else if (code == 520) {
	java.toast("💔IP被拉黑");
	}
else {
	java.toast("💔搜索响应码异常");
	}


} catch(err) {
	cache.put('8xbl1', source.getVariable() );
	source.setVariable('');
	}
//	cookie.replaceCookie(nn,cok);
//	url
</js>
variableComment:
♦源变量：
　 当前书源使用的网址
　 可点击发现页版本号手动刷新

♦书籍变量：
　 ①填写  🔒 并刷新，关闭本书评论显示
　 ②填写“目录”并刷新，强制刷新目录
　 ③填写分数并刷新，使用分数进行评分
　 ④填写其它并刷新，内容作为评论发送
分数格式示意“1分”“2分”…“10分”

㊟详情页检测到有更新内容时才刷新目录(书架刷新不影响)

！注意区分源变量和书籍变量
